name: Static (itch)
description:
Static is a fast paced puzzle platformer inspired by games such as 'Super Meat Boy' and 'N++'

You accidentally entered a door to a parallel world, and now you must make your way back home before it's too late.

Thirty seconds is all you have to collect all the gems and open the door to the next level. With forty challenging stages to traverse, players must run, jump, double-jump and wall-jump to their goal.

Key Features

  • 40 unique levels to test your platforming prowess
  • Multiple endings to unlock determined by your speed
  • Addictively challenging difficulty
  • Replay levels to hone your skills and perfect your time

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement

Space: Jump

Space + Space: Double-Jump

Space + Arrow Key Next To A Wall: Wall-Jump

Enter: Quick Retry

Escape: Pause

Credits
